response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,200,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. We understand that such an investment is significant, and we are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or if there's anything else we can provide to help you make a decision.", "product_price": 1350000}
